Metadata.description: Create and manage Counter-Strike nades on your discord servers.

Hero.title: Improve your game with useful nades.
Hero.next-level: Take your gameplay to the next level. Combine
Hero.rest: to create, search and share the most useful nades.

Search-Section.search-msg: Type something to search for a nade.
Search-Section.must-login: You have to be logged in and be in a server to search nades.

item-1.title: Server Content
item-1.content-1: The project and its creator are not responsible for the content uploaded to the servers that are part of the project. Each user and server administrator is solely responsible for the content published on their server.
item-1.content-2: Users agree not to use the Bot for illicit or malicious activities. The use of the Bot must comply with all applicable laws and regulations.

item-2.title: Use of Server Names
item-2.content-1: Users agree not to represent other servers or groups of people unrelated to them when creating a server. Creating servers with names that may cause confusion or impersonate entities, companies, or brands to which they have no legitimate right is not allowed.

item-3.title: Responsibility for Server Content
item-3.content-1: Users who own or administer a server are responsible for the content uploaded to their servers. This includes the responsibility to review, moderate, and manage content in accordance with the rules and policies established by the server.
item-3.content-2: Users must actively monitor content, edit, remove, or publish it as appropriate to maintain a safe and respectful environment on their server.

item-4.title: Resolution
item-4.content-1: By using the Discord Bot and participating in the project, you acknowledge and agree that the project and its creator assume no responsibility for the content posted on the servers, nor for any misuse or consequences resulting from the use of the Bot.
item-4.content-2: Violation of these Terms may result in the termination of your access to the Bot and associated services.
item-4.content-3: These Terms may be updated periodically, and it is your responsibility to review them regularly. Your continued use of the Bot after any modifications to the Terms will constitute your acceptance of them.
item-4.content-4: If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms, please contact us through the provided support channels.
item-4.content-6: By using the Discord Bot and participating in the project, you declare that you have read, understood, and accepted these Terms and Conditions.

Nades-Section.do-query-to-search: Type something to search for a nade.

User-Profile.no-last-nade: You haven't uploaded a nade yet.
User-Profile.no-servers: You're not a member of a server yet.

prev.no-owned-server: There are no servers that you own, or all have already been created.

Create-Server.accept-terms: You must accept the terms and conditions to continue.

server-name.label: Server Name
server-name.description: Public name to display on the page.

server-description.label: Server Description
server-description.description: Description to display on the page.

terms.label: I accept the terms and conditions.

api.error: An error ocurred when tried to create the server.
An error ocurred when tried to join the servers.

action.explanation: This action cannot be undone. It will permanently delete this server along with its grenades.

api.error: An error ocurred when tried to leave the server.

BanUnban-User.unban-user-description: User will join the server again and will see the nades.
BanUnban-User.ban-user-description: The user will no longer be part of the server. He will not be able to rejoin or see the nades.

api.error-unban: An error ocurred when tried to unban the user.
api.error-ban: An error ocurred when tried to ban the user.

Give-Role.give-admin-description: The user will be able to access the server configuration (can't delete the server), manage grenades and users.
Give-Role.remove-admin-description: The user will no longer be able to access the server configuration, manage grenades or users.

api.error: An error ocurred when tried to update user's role.
An error ocurred when tried to approve the nade.
An error ocurred when tried to edit the nade.

api/get-nades.error: An error ocurred when trying to get nades.
